fields_of_interest: Trade, International co-operation and development, Taxation, External Relations, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement 
Trade and Sustainable Development Chapters of Free Trade Agreements 
The European Union's Generalised System of Preferences 
Trade Barriers Regulation
goals__remit: I am currently coordinating the GSP Platform. The GSP Platform represents a group of human rights and development organizations, trade unions and other stakeholders seeking to advance human rights and labour rights; as well as promote civic space in the context of the trade preferences of the European Union. Civic space entails the freedom of expression, freedom to peaceful assembly and freedom of association. Signatories currently include. See http://gspplatform.eu/ for more information.
